name: consenhub-backend
description: TM Forum-compliant Consent Management System for SLT Mobitel

scripts.install:all: cd backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../consent-service && npm install && cd ../preference-service && npm install && cd ../privacy-notice-service && npm install && cd ../agreement-service && npm install && cd ../event-service && npm install && cd ../party-service && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../dsar-service && npm install && cd ../admin-service && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.start:all-simple: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:consent" "npm run start:preference" "npm run start:privacy-notice" "npm run start:agreement" "npm run start:event" "npm run start:party" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:dsar" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.swagger:docker: docker build -f swagger.dockerfile -t consenhub-swagger . && docker run -p 8080:8080 consenhub-swagger
scripts.docs:deploy: echo 'Pushing to GitHub will auto-deploy to Pages via GitHub Actions'
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:consent" "npm run dev:preference" "npm run dev:privacy-notice" "npm run dev:agreement" "npm run dev:event" "npm run dev:party" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:dsar"
scripts.test: echo "Running all service tests..." && cd backend/consent-service && npm test && cd ../preference-service && npm test && cd ../privacy-notice-service && npm test && cd ../agreement-service && npm test && cd ../event-service && npm test && cd ../party-service && npm test && cd ../auth-service && npm test && cd ../dsar-service && npm test
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:build
scripts.deploy:docs: npm run build:docs && docker run -p 8080:8080 consenhub-docs

author: ConsentHub Team
